entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Blanc-Sablon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:55 PM AST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -24.2°C

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Saturday 25 February 2023
